meanings.definition: The quality or state of being faddish.
meanings.sent1: Her faddishness in clothing choices made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: The faddishness of that hairstyle faded quickly.
meanings.sent3: His faddishness for neon colors was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The faddishness of social media trends is like a whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: The faddishness of her accessories was hard to ignore.

meanings.definition: The tendency to follow trends or fads.
meanings.sent1: The faddishness of her friends influenced her style.
meanings.sent2: His faddishness led him to buy the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent3: Their faddishness for quirky hobbies was entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The faddishness of their behavior was contagious.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't resist the faddishness of the new dance craze.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being fashionable or trendy.
meanings.sent1: The faddishness of her outfits caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: His faddishness in music taste was well-known.
meanings.sent3: Their faddishness for retro styles was endearing.
meanings.sent4: The faddishness of the latest designer bag was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: She embraced the faddishness of the current fashion trends.
